column2: It was a pleasant surprise when I found this place in Chinatown. Super cute interior and superb food! It’s a perfect place for Sunday brunch. And it was not even crowded on Sunday. The circular French toast was one of the best I’ve tasted. Will definitely come back.
Wow I’m very impressed with this exceptional brunch!  It was surprisingly filling and super tasty.  Yes, it’s pricey but very well worth it!  Super friendly staff as well!!
Fantastic breakfast.  The food was delicious and beautiful. Excellent service. Looking forward to going again while we are in San Francisco.
Good combination of American breakfast and Thai. Homemade bread and jam. We have egg Benedict and French toast.
Try new breakfast & Brunch at Schilling Cafe Homemade 10 sourdough bread so good and homemade jam The food is so fresh and good I order homemade smoked salmon with Pain Anglaise bread
I thoroughly enjoyed breakfast here.  The food and service was very good!  I would definitely come back.

If you want to have a quality breakfast, go there! Super friendly staff. Nice selection of teas (loose) served in a nice Tea pot. my Florentine was delicious, the hollandaise sauce was not too heavy, the bread soft, the eggs cooked perfectly! The place is spotless, more locals than tourists.  I will definitely come back on  my next trip.

Fabulous breakfast find. The best brioche French toast. As a European travelling in the US I am always delighted to find a decent cup of coffee too - sensible sized pottery mug and great tasting! Very friendly service and kindly filled our water bottles. Tucked away but worth seeking out.
Great breakfast spot. Delicious fried rice and basil chicken- perfect to nurse a hangover. Large, clean space. Great cappuccino too.

This is a great place to come for breakfast. I had the florentine and it was divine. The atmosphere is great. The whole vibe was just right and positive. Can't wait to come again on my next visit to San Francisco!!!
Thank you
I don’t leave reviews. The food here is beautifully prepared and very flavorful. This is an absolute gem. You must eat here!
Great French toast & service. Good prices, had 30% off for March. Comfortable seats, cute & clean inside. Definitely recommend!
Thank you
Was close to our hotel (walking distance). Had breakfast there twice. Food is fresh and delicious!
the food is very rich but the best are the salads.
The food was delicious the workers where super kind the place was impeccable.  INCREDIBLE
Amazing food, beautiful clean and calming with friendly staff, will be coming back
Really good quality food! Breakfast, Lunch and dessert, everything made by them! Price moderate! Clean place and nice stuff!!
Really enjoy food nice and light. Just what I need very flavorful
Great spot for lunch. Good food, good atmosphere and my personal favorite: half off cold sandwiches and salads after 2:00.
wow!! This place is amazing! Food, atmosphere & decor, service
Great healthy foods and many selections and options from salads, sandwiches, and hot foods all reasonably priced.
Tasty food, pleasant environment, excellent customer service 👍👍👍
Burger was the best I've had in awhile.
Fresh and tasty food, great service
The food is good, but people here never in a good mood. No smiles, no thanks.
Good breakfast...bacon sausages and quiche
Undercooked eggs, plastic plates and cutlery, worst coffee I've ever had.
Service is very good!
Is very good good good
Quick sandwiches caaaaamooonnnn

Great place to grab a bite to eat. Everything is delicious, the projections are large, a station of spices will be brought to the table, those who somehow love it spicier. Water is also sold without problems and the discount declared at 30% is also taken into account. In general, inexpensive and satisfying.
Thank you
Delicious brunch, attentive service, elegant table and soft atmosphere. Excellent value for money: to discover!
Your food is very rich
Thank you
